accuracy.description: Are all facts, figures, and claims accurate and traceable to the article with no hallucinated information?

completeness.description: Does the summary capture all key points including the primary event, relevant figures, parties involved, and material implications?

conciseness.description: Is the summary appropriately sized with no filler phrases, excessive hedging, or redundancy?

relevance.description: Does the summary lead with the most important takeaway and prioritises relevant information?

commentary_quality.description: Is any commentary clearly distinguished from article facts, relevant, and insightful? If no commentary is included, is that appropriate?

professional_tone.description: Is the language professional, precise, and appropriate for senior banker communication?
